summary:
Have a polar swim with an eyeful and a half with this terribly-non-lore-friendly-but-fun-to-use-speedo. Now with color options! For Favored Soul & Sundracon bodies.
-Male Only-
descriptionHtml:
[color=cyan][size=28]Ice-Dip Speedo[/color][/size]

Want to take a dip in the water? Then it\'ll be an \"icy dip\" ;) ....this is Skyrim afterall. Enclosed are muli-color variants as depicted in the photos section.

[color=orange]<><><> Crafted at Tanning Racks <><><>[/color]

NOTE: This is an original and standalone mod purely for fun. Not lore-friendly. Be sure to check the data files from your Skyrim Launcher & doublecheck that the mod is loaded.

*This mod is integrated with the Favored Soul body and Sundracon male bodies, so, problems likely to occur if you do not have either of the corresponding mods installed. 

Feel free to use for other projects &/or improve upon this mesh.

<><>Revision History<><>
Favored Soul 1.1 - slimmed the front of mesh, vertex weights still fight me though >_< and reduced overall shine to avoid the plastic look. Original mesh is still available in the new file, color options only affect the new mesh. Different ingredients for each color 

Sundracon 1.0 - Converted mesh to the Sundracon body. A mesh made from scratch would have weighted better (presumably) but oh wells. The FS mesh can still be used with the Sundracon body but apparently the mesh will force the body into the FS shape.

CREDITS:
Chris57, Favored Soul & Sundracon\'s male body mesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Smooth body texture for Favored Soul/Sundracon body by Urshi
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145

Male char in screenshot is a variant of Urshi\'s companion mod Hot Male Housecarls
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17163

Hair is from ApachiiSkyHair (also included in the Hot Male Housecarls mod)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
author: Av1dPup1l
